alert.note: Alert for Transylvania (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 04 at 11:37AM EST until February 05 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of Transylvania County. * WHEN...Until 1230 PM EST. * IMPACTS...River or streamflows remain elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1134 AM EST, Flooding of low lying areas along the French Broad River around Brevard and downstream will linger, as well as select tributaries, such as the Little River. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Brevard, Dupont State Forest, Penrose, Little River, Connestee and North Transylvania. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
